description: A user submits a new English tagline with the coined term "Zephyr™" for the Japanese market. The bot flags the term, gets user approval to add it to the glossary, fetches Japanese cultural guidelines, translates the tagline, looks up the term in the glossary, evaluates tone, validates length, generates the final localized asset, stores it in the CMS, and returns the asset URL.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered content localization bot.
